data: `minecraft:behavior.move_to_village` allows an entity to travel to a random x,y,z coordinate in a village.

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

data.Name: goal_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached the goal. This is the "wiggle room" to stop the AI from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot

data.Name: search_range
data.Description: The distance in blocks to search for villages. If <= 0, find the closest village regardless of distance.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
